metadata.description: Waves crash on the beaches of California as Jessica Blandy wakes up in her lover's arms for the last time. A mysterious killer is stalking the streets of San Francisco with a chilling final message for his victims: remember Enola Gay. Sexy. strong-willed Jessie won't rest until she's found the truth. a quest for revenge that propels her into a world of thugs. mystics. and crooked cops in this classic thriller by Renaud & Dufaux.
metadata.name: Jessica Blandy
